title: Scrapland.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
Scrapland.Repack-R.G.Mechanics



Release Info:

Year: 2004
Genre: Action
Developer: Enlight Software
Publisher: Mercury Steam
Publication Type: RePack
Game Language: Eng |Rus
Voice Language: Eng |Rus
Crack: ToXa / DIE



System Requirements:

Operating system: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7
Processor: Intel Pentium III
Memory: 256 MB
Video: 32 MB compatible with DirectX 8.1, shaders 1.1
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX
Free space on hard disk: 2 GB

Game information:

The game takes place on an asteroid called Scrapland,
ruined paradise rebuilt robots, only residents of the asteroid.
The player controls D- Tritus-ohm, self-construction of a young
robot who has just arrived at the main city of the asteroid,
Chimera. The adventure begins when he takes the job as a
journalist and strange things start to happen ...


Repack Features:

Scrapland
Includes crack text from 7 Wolf v1.05
Do not cut / recoded
Ability to select a combination of text and voice
